item.name: ISR < 备份次数的分区个数
系统最大文件打开数
item.description: It could be increased by using sysctrl utility or modifying file /etc/sysctl.conf.

item.name: 系统最大进程数
item.description: It could be increased by using sysctrl utility or modifying file /etc/sysctl.conf.

item.name: 当前活动进程数
item.description: Number of processes in running state.

item.name: 当前进程数
item.description: Total number of processes in any state.

item.name: CPU 5分钟负载
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: CPU 5分钟负载
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: CPU 15分钟负载
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: CPU使用率
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing hardware interrupts.

item.name: CPU软件中断率
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing software interrupts.

item.name: 虚拟CPU等待（虚拟cpu等待物理cpu时间百分比）
item.description: The amount of CPU 'stolen' from this virtual machine by the hypervisor for other tasks (such as running another virtual machine).

item.name: CPU空闲时间比
item.description: The time the CPU has spent doing nothing.

item.name: CPU磁盘等待时间比
item.description: Amount of time the CPU has been waiting for I/O to complete.

item.name: CPU加权时间比（用作nice加权的进程分配的用户进程cpu时间比）
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that have been niced.

item.name: CPU内核占用时间
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running the kernel and its processes.

item.name: CPU用户进程占用比
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that are not niced.

item.name: 主机名
item.description: System host name.

item.name: 系统信息
item.description: The information as normally returned by 'uname -a'.

item.name: 登陆用户数
item.description: Number of users who are currently logged in.

item.name: 可用内存
item.description: Available memory is defined as free+cached+buffers memory.

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

trigger_prototype.name: 挂载点 {#FSNAME}剩余空间不足70%
挂载点{#FSNAME}未使用inode不足20%

item.name: Zabbix preprocessing queue
item.description: Count of values enqueued in the preprocessing queue.

MySQL-Key读命中
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL接收数据
item.description:

item.name: MySQL发送数据

item.name: 在线状态
item.description: The agent always returns 1 for this item. It could be used in combination with nodata() for availability check.

item.description: 收包数量

item.description: 发包数据量

trigger.name: Leader election has occurred in last 15m
Less than 5% free in the value cache
Less than 25% free in the configuration cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing CacheSize in the zabbix_server.conf configuration file

trigger.name: Less than 25% free in the history cache
Less than 25% free in the history index cache
Less than 25% free in the trends cache
Less than 25% free in the vmware cache
Max lag in messages btw follower and leader replicas > 4000
Max lag in messages btw follower and leader replicas > 4000
More than 100 items having missing data for more than 10 minutes
trigger.description: zabbix[queue,10m] item is collecting data about how many items are missing data for more than 10 minutes (next parameter)

trigger.name: Unclean leader election has occurred last 15m
Zabbix alerter processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix alert manager processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix configuration syncer processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix discoverer processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix escalator processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix history syncer processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix housekeeper processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix http poller processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix icmp pinger processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix ipmi manager processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix ipmi poller processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix java poller processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix poller processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix preprocessing manager processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix preprocessing worker processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix proxy poller processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix self-monitoring processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix snmp trapper processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix task manager processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix timer processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix trapper processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix unreachable poller processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix value cache working in low memory mode
Zabbix vmware collector processes more than 75% busy
zookeeper state role has been changed
{HOST.NAME}CPU等待IO时间过长
trigger.description: OS spends significant time waiting for I/O (input/output) operations. It could be indicator of performance issues with storage system.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}G1 新生代区达到最大限制
{HOST.NAME}G1 老年代区达到最大限制
{HOST.NAME}PS 新生代区达到最大限制
{HOST.NAME}交换空间不足
trigger.description: It probably means that the systems requires more physical memory.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}本地时间同服务器时间不同
